name: pixi-playground
author: Lo√Øc TRUCHOT <loic.truchot.pro@gmail.com>
description: A pre installed environnement to work with pixi.js with webpack & typescript

scripts.npm-reset: rm -rf node_modules && npm cache verify && npm i
scripts.git-reset: git reset HEAD --hard && git clean -fd && git fetch --all --tags --prune && git pull
